result.markdown:
---
title: "Randomized Controlled Trials"
---

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_62f9bef164bb913fca6d5ca1088c4c20'}

```{.r .cell-code}
AB_testing <-readRDS("C:/Users/ahmed/OneDrive/Dokumente/Causal_Data_Science_Data/abtest_online.rds")
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_5e9befaa44f7faa9d95f737fb25c75e6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library("ggplot2")
compare_purchase <- ggplot(AB_testing, aes(x = chatbot, y = purchase_amount, color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  stat_summary(geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               fun.data = "mean_se", 
               fun.args = list(mult=1.96),
               show.legend = F) +
labs(x = "chatbot", y = "purchase_amount", title = "Difference in purchace_amount")

compare_purchase
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_881e4fe1d4ed600d4a9082701ae63a09'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library("ggplot2")
compare_mobile <- ggplot(AB_testing, aes(x = chatbot, y = mobile_device, color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  stat_summary(geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               fun.data = "mean_se", 
               fun.args = list(mult=1.96),
               show.legend = F) +
labs(x = "chatbot", y = "mobile_device", title = "Difference in mobile_device")

compare_mobile
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_208cea387210d8888f556aa2d2277ccd'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library("ggplot2")
compare_visits <- ggplot(AB_testing, aes(x = chatbot, y = previous_visit, color = as.factor(chatbot))) +
  stat_summary(geom = "errorbar", 
               width = .5,
               fun.data = "mean_se", 
               fun.args = list(mult=1.96),
               show.legend = F) +
labs(x = "chatbot", y = "previous_visit", title = "Difference in previous_visit")

compare_visits
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](06_rct_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_c3bb490b764297e5013f6eeb72f523e1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_all <- lm(purchase_amount ~ chatbot, data = AB_testing)
summary(lm_all)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = purchase_amount ~ chatbot, data = AB_testing)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -16.702 -14.478  -9.626  13.922  64.648 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)  16.7017     0.8374  19.944  < 2e-16 ***
#> chatbotTRUE  -7.0756     1.1796  -5.998 2.79e-09 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 18.65 on 998 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.0348,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.03383 
#> F-statistic: 35.98 on 1 and 998 DF,  p-value: 2.787e-09
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_b89d0f62f5f194d17abeadf2ba734340'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_inter <- lm(purchase_amount ~ chatbot*mobile_device, data = AB_testing)
summary(lm_inter)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> lm(formula = purchase_amount ~ chatbot * mobile_device, data = AB_testing)
#> 
#> Residuals:
#>    Min     1Q Median     3Q    Max 
#> -16.98 -14.54  -9.95  14.13  65.24 
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>                               Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept)                    16.9797     1.0152  16.725   <2e-16 ***
#> chatbotTRUE                    -7.0301     1.4284  -4.922    1e-06 ***
#> mobile_deviceTRUE              -0.8727     1.7987  -0.485    0.628    
#> chatbotTRUE:mobile_deviceTRUE  -0.1526     2.5369  -0.060    0.952    
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> Residual standard error: 18.66 on 996 degrees of freedom
#> Multiple R-squared:  0.03534,	Adjusted R-squared:  0.03244 
#> F-statistic: 12.16 on 3 and 996 DF,  p-value: 8.034e-08
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='06_rct_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_472e40f37bb7883f7ec9389856c5b489'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm_logistic <- glm(formula= purchase ~ chatbot, family=binomial(link='logit'), data= AB_testing)
summary(lm_logistic)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
#> 
#> Call:
#> glm(formula = purchase ~ chatbot, family = binomial(link = "logit"), 
#>     data = AB_testing)
#> 
#> Coefficients:
#>             Estimate Std. Error z value Pr(>|z|)    
#> (Intercept) -0.01613    0.08981  -0.180    0.857    
#> chatbotTRUE -0.98939    0.13484  -7.337 2.18e-13 ***
#> ---
#> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
#> 
#> (Dispersion parameter for binomial family taken to be 1)
#> 
#>     Null deviance: 1329.1  on 999  degrees of freedom
#> Residual deviance: 1273.3  on 998  degrees of freedom
#> AIC: 1277.3
#> 
#> Number of Fisher Scoring iterations: 4
```
:::
:::
